useCase.name: Specify Remote Replication Policy for a Collection

mainSequence.step: Repository Manager accesses Replication Policy Settings
EDRMS Interface retrieves Current Policy Settings
Replication Policy Module queries Existing Policies in EDRMS Database
Replication Policy Module shows Current Policies to EDRMS Interface
EDRMS Interface displays Current Policies to Repository Manager
Repository Manager defines/updates Policy for Collection
Replication Policy Module updates Policy in EDRMS Database
Replication Policy Module initiates Policy Replication Update with Remote Storage Service
Remote Storage Service acknowledges Replication Policy Update
Replication Policy Module confirms Policy Update to EDRMS Interface
EDRMS Interface shows Update Confirmation to Repository Manager
